channel.title: How can i add a starter to a 704?
channel.description: iv managed to do everything to this source and the one thing i cant seem to do is add a starter if anyone knows how to it would really help :)

item.title: How can i add a starter to a 704?
item.dc:creator: @BlitzzHD BlitzzHD
item.description:
@BlitzzHD wrote:

ok i did all that just i didnt get where to put public int starter = 0;

Read full topic
item.source: How can i add a starter to a 704?

item.title: How can i add a starter to a 704?
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

okay blitz go to:
src>com>rs>game>player open player.java and search for

	[code]if (donator || donatorTill != 0) {[/code]

after that method add this:

[code]	if (starter == 0) {
        getInventory().addItem(995, 500000);
        starter = 1;
        } [/code]

then go to the bottom of:

[code]public void run() {[/code]

and add:

	[code]public int starter = 0;[/code]

save comple there is a starter of 500k

Read full topic
item.source: How can i add a starter to a 704?

item.title: How can i add a starter to a 704?
item.dc:creator: @EclipseRSPS EclipseRSPS
item.description:
@EclipseRSPS wrote:

Figure out where to add yourself.

if (starter == 0) { getInventory().addItem(995, 500000); starter = 1; }

Read full topic
item.source: How can i add a starter to a 704?

item.title: How can i add a starter to a 704?
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

[quote=“Ruby Forums Coder, post:3, topic:437619”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=540323.msg3956758#msg3956758 date=1332821384]

iv managed to do everything to this source and the one thing i cant seem to do is add a starter if anyone knows how to it would really help

“do everything” Uh. You haven’t added a starter so not everything.
[/quote]

LOL.

There’s a tutorial on removing the starter in the tutorials section I think, just reverse the process of that unto adding items instead of deleting them.[/quote]

Read full topic
